title.en: Estonian for Beginners II, on the Basis of English, Level A1.1 - A1.2
title.et: Eesti keele algkursus II, inglise keele baasil, A1.1 - A1.2

faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

name.en: Department of Languages of the Baltic Region

structural_unit_name.en: Department of Languages of the Baltic Region

description.en:
The course deals with the 5 topics:
MINA JA ÜLIKOOL (Me and my studies)
MIDA SA EILE TEGID? (What did you do yesterday? Verbs)
SÕBRAD JA NAABRID (Friends and Neighbors. Adjectives)
INIMESED: VÄLIMUS JA RIIDED (People: appearance and clothes)
KODU: MAJA JA TUBA (Home, house and room. Postpositions)
description.et:
Kursuse jooksul käsitletakse 5 teemat:
MINA JA ÜLIKOOL
MIDA SA EILE TEGID? (verbid / verbs)
SÕBRAD JA NAABRID (adjektiivid / adjectives)
INIMESED: VÄLIMUS JA RIIDED
KODU: MAJA JA TUBA (postpositsioonid / postpositions)

objectives.en: This is a short continuation course for beginners that develops the  students' basic knowledge of the Estonian grammatical stuctures and spoken language. The aim of the course is to practise the basics of Estonian grammar and vocabulary. The intended outcome of the course is the language level A1.2 (Basic User) in all the language skills.
objectives.et: Süvendada ja täiendada eesti keele põhisõnavara ja grammatika aluseid. Kursuse eesmärk on saavutada keeleoskustase A1.1>A1.2.

grade_evaluation.et:
Grading 
1) 2 written tests: 40% (both tests give 20%);
2) 'Starditest' and 2 preparation tests in Moodle: 20% (both pre-tests give 10%. 'Starditest' is not graded, but it's mandatory to take the test and get at least 7.5 points + write answers to 20 questions);
3) 2 speaking classes 40% (both speaking classes give 20%);
4) active participation in the Estonian classes: 10%:
10% for attending at least 28 classes; 
5% for attending at least 25 classes; 
0% for attending 24 or 23 classes. 
If one attends less than 23 classes, the course is failed (F).
Grades
Grade A: 91%>100%
Grade B: 81%>90%
Grade C: 71%>80%
Grade D: 61%>70%
Grade E: 51%>60%
Grade F: 0%>50%
Please note that one can not retake the test that already has a positive grade: A,B,C,D,E. 
One can retake a test only once. The retake test is different from the original test.
The course is failed (F) if one fails the retake test.

debt_elimination.et: Kokkuleppel õppejõuga, õppejõu vastuvõtuajal, kuid mitte hiljem kui jaanuaris 2025.

assessment_scale.et: Eristav (A, B, C, D, E, F, mi)
assessment_scale.en: differentiated (A, B, C, D, E, F, not present)

The course material Eesti keel II, A1.1>A1.2, by Estonian language teacher Piret Toomet.

Juhan Tuldava "Estonian Textbook". NB! Do not buy it. Take it from the library.
Mare Kitsnik, Leelo Kingisepp "Teach yourself Estonian" with CDs. NB! Do not buy it. Take it from the library.
